fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Magical: You choose your starting hand within the first phase of the game. Max 1 special card. No duplicates.
- Enchanting: When you open a channel with someone else, you learn their true role.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Reveal: Pick a player. Learn their entire hand with modifiers. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Ensnare: Pick a non-King player. If they have played at least 1 card this phase, prevent them from playing more. [1 use, Unique]
- Silence: Pick a non-King player. Prevent them from using abilities in the next phase. [1 use, Unique]
